file_insights.changes: Added 4 new icon imports and 5 styled icon components for step status visualization
key_modifications: Imported CancelIcon, ErrorIcon, HourglassEmptyIcon, RadioButtonUncheckedIcon from @mui/icons-material
Created styled components: CompletedIcon, RejectedIcon, ErrorStepIcon, PendingIcon, InactiveIcon
Refactored CustomStepIcon to use getIconComponent() function for conditional icon rendering
All styled icons inherit color and use consistent fontSize of 18

patterns_discovered.description: Used styled() from @mui/material/styles to wrap icon components with consistent styling
patterns_discovered.benefit: Centralizes icon styling and enables theme integration

patterns_discovered.description: Implemented getIconComponent() helper function for status-based icon selection
patterns_discovered.benefit: Improves code readability and maintainability over ternary operators

patterns_discovered.description: Used color: 'inherit' to allow parent container to control icon color
patterns_discovered.benefit: Provides flexibility for theming without duplicating color logic

gotchas_discovered.issue: Unused theme parameter in styled components
gotchas_discovered.description: All styled icon components receive ({ theme }) parameter but don't use it
gotchas_discovered.potential_impact: Code clarity - suggests incomplete styling or future theme-dependent styling
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Remove unused parameter or document why it's needed for future theme integration

gotchas_discovered.description: getIconComponent() returns RejectedIcon for error state but no ErrorStepIcon usage in logic
gotchas_discovered.potential_impact: ErrorStepIcon component defined but unreachable in current logic
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Clarify error vs rejected states or update conditional logic

gotchas_discovered.description: Only InactiveIcon applies opacity styling while others inherit color
gotchas_discovered.potential_impact: Inconsistent styling approach across status icons
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Standardize styling pattern across all icon components

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created styled icon components for step status indicators
what_worked: Clean abstraction of icon components using MUI styled API
Improved CustomStepIcon readability with helper function
Proper icon imports and component composition
issues: Unused theme parameters suggest incomplete implementation
Missing ErrorStepIcon usage in conditional logic
Inconsistent styling patterns across status icons

recommendations.action: Remove unused theme parameters from styled components or document their purpose for future theme integration
Update getIconComponent() logic to utilize ErrorStepIcon or remove it if error state uses RejectedIcon
Standardize styling approach - ensure all status icons apply consistent styling properties (color, opacity, etc.)
Add tests to verify all icon states render correctly (completed, rejected, error, pending, inactive)
Document the status icon mapping (completed → CheckCircle, error → Cancel, etc.) for maintainability
